title: Matthew Carter in Saint Louis
content:
Three type/Matthew Carter events in Saint Louis next week:   
   
_Thursday, October 9_   
**Panel: Intellectual Property Rights and Type Design**   
Held at the School of Law, Washington University   
4:30 pm   
   
**Lecture: Matthew Carter, _"Truth to Materials"_ in Type: Printer Fonts and Screen Fonts**   
Steinberg Auditorium, Washington University   
7:30 pm   
   
_Friday, October 10_   
**Opening for: Typographically Speaking: The Art of Matthew Carter**   
Des Lee Gallery, 1627 Washington Ave., Downtown Saint Louis. Opening is from 6-8 pm, show runs fron October 10 to November 29.
author: benkiel
